show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Connect The Dots
content:
On Todayâ€™s Connect the Dots, PRN host, green health journalist, and Huffington reporter Alison Rose Levy... <!--more--> (www.healthjournalistblog.
com and @alisonroselevy) features the directors of two important grass roots organization protecting our health, food, and water.
In the first part of the program, Alison speaks with Barbara Arrindell ( http://www.damascuscitizens.org/) the Co-Founder of Damascus Citizens for Sustainable Energy, and in the second half, Nancy Romer, Director of the Brooklyn Food Coalition, http://brooklynfoodcoalition.ning.
com/ which hosted the recent Brooklyn Food Conference attended by over five thousand people.
